r6:
**Rainbow Six Siege Statistics**

```m.r6 cas|casual <username> pc|xbl|psn```
Gets a user's stats for casual play.

```pfxr6 rnk|ranked <username> pc|xbl|psn```
Gets a user's stats for ranked play.

```pfxr6 topop|operator <username> pc|xbl|psn```
Gets a user's stats for their most played operator.
Add a number at the end to move trough the list.

```pfxr6 misc|general <username> pc|xbl|psn```
Gets additional stats on a user unrelated to game mode.
remind: Use the `remind me <text> in <time><unit>` command to set reminders for yourself.
